BW Celebrates Awards With Fall Promotion
Best Western International, THE WORLD’S BIGGEST HOTEL FAMILY®, is celebrating earning more industry awards than any other hotel brand by giving Best Western Rewards® members a $25 Best Western Travel Card® when they stay two separate times between September 8, 2015 and November 22, 2015.Best Western Travel Cards can be used like cash to pay for stays at Best Western hotels worldwide.
“As recently as last month, Best Western Rewards was named a top hotel loyalty program for the third consecutive year by U.S. News & World Report,” said Dorothy Dowling, senior vice president of marketing and sales for Best Western International. “Best Western has more reasons to celebrate than ever before due to the prestigious industry awards we are winning. We know winning these awards would not be possible without our loyal guests, and we want to thank them by giving them something they can use towards their next Best Western stay.”
Best Western Rewards has emerged as a powerhouse among hotel loyalty programs in recent years. In addition to the top three ranking by U.S. News and World Report, Best Western Rewards was also recognized by J.D. Power as one of the top three hotel loyalty programs. With points that never expire and offering the lowest redemption thresholds for awards, the Best Western Rewards program has continued to be one of the industry’s most generous rewards programs for more than 25 years. With hotels in more than 100 countries, Best Western makes it easy for members to earn points that can be redeemed global free room nights with no blackout dates, the Best Western Travel Card, dining, shopping and entertainment gift cards, gas cards, airline/partner rewards and much more. Best Western’s Status Match…No Catch® program will match members’ elite status in any other hotel loyalty program, free of charge.
Source:-Best Western
